name: Frank NELLOM v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of October, 2004, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
